description:
Mother and Father Mouse hunt for the best husband, a wife and husband 
communicate without words, and a couple battles for the last rice ball.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mouse Takes a Groom / The Pebble Letter / The Silence Contest
Nezumi no Mukotori / Koishi no Tegami / Danmari Kurabe
ねずみの婿取り / 小石の手紙 / だんまりくらべ
